trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Mary
There were no other sightings in Lake Mary on or around December 3rd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTaking pictures of christmas lights and set up the camera for a low light night shot. While out shooting multiple pictures of house, saw something out of the corner of my eye but dismissed it, when i got home i downloaded the photos and notice the streak on the one since I take in very high resolution i blew up the photo and looks like a disk that came down left to right then made a turn. I do not know what it is however I was standing in the driveway of the house and Sanford international airport is about 5 miles away and Orlando international is about 20.... Any help would be appreciated?
Summary: Like a Comet or shooting Star that Turned
